items.name: Old Key
items.description: You found this key on the table in the parlour. It opens a door somewhere
items.long_description: A tarnished brass key, remnants of a bygone era. Its intricate design whispers of secrets held within forgotten doors, echoing the nostalgia of a time long past
items.location_description: You see an Old Key on a table

items.name: Doll Head
items.description: Head of a doll. It's missing its body
items.long_description: Lifeless eyes peer through faded curls, a relic of forgotten playtimes, evoking a haunting sense of nostalgia in the eerie atmosphere of the decaying room
items.location_description: You see a Doll Head on a book shelf

items.name: Doll Body
items.description: Body of a doll. It's missing its head
items.long_description: Plastic limbs and faded fabric dress telling tales of forgotten tea parties and childhood innocence. Amidst the dust, it silently echoes the passage of time and memories left behind
items.location_description: You see a Doll Body on a table

items.name: Doll
items.description: An old Doll. Not sure where to use this
items.long_description: Its glassy eyes hold a hint of melancholy, a silent witness to the bygone days when laughter filled the grand rooms of the mansion
items.combine_success_description: You put together the Doll Head and Doll Body, completing the full Doll

items.name: Puzzle Piece
items.description: A missing puzzle piece, it kind of looks like someone's eye
items.long_description: A lone puzzle piece, its vibrant artwork adrift in a sea of forgotten games
items.location_description: You see a Puzzle Piece on the dusty cracked wood floor

items.name: Dirty Cloth
items.description: A Dirty Cloth, smells like rotting flesh
items.long_description: Stains and dust intertwine with the fabric, bearing witness to years of neglect. The cloth, once vibrant, now tells a silent story of time's passage and the faded elegance of the vintage setting
items.location_description: You see a Dirty Cloth on the dining table

items.name: Candle
items.long_description: A partially melted 80s wax candle stands on an ornate holder in the mansion. Its wick, frozen in time, whispers of forgotten gatherings
items.location_description: You see a white Candle from the corner of your eye, on top of the shelf

items.name: Lighter
items.description: A lighter used to light things on fire
items.long_description: its surface worn and marked by time, rests on a dusty mantelpiece in the mansion
items.location_description: You see the Lighter on the table

items.name: Lit Candle
items.long_description: The warm glow of a scented candle fills the air in the mansion. Its flame dances gracefully atop the wick, casting soft shadows on the retro wallpaper
items.combine_success_description: You light the candle with the lighter, creating a Lit Candle

items.name: Pendant
items.description: A shiny green Pendant, looks like it belongs to someone
items.long_description: Suspended from a delicate chain, catches the light in the mansion. The emerald hue, faded yet elegant, dangles with a hint of mystery, echoing the era's fashion
items.location_description: You spot a Pendant in between the wood planks on the floor.

items.name: Rusted Knife
items.description: A rusty knife, it can barely cut anything
items.long_description: Neglected and forsaken, its corroded blade tells tales of a time when it may have been a kitchen companion or a forgotten tool in the grand estate
items.location_description: There's a Rusted Knife on the marble countertop
